00041     static const int32_t WEF_NULL                     = 0x00000000; 
00042     static const int32_t WEF_NO_WARNING_ERROR         = 0x00000000; 
00043     static const int32_t WEF_RESERVED_0               = 0x00000001; 
00044     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_1           = 0x00000002; 
00045     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_2           = 0x00000004; 
00046     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_3           = 0x00000008; 
00047     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_4           = 0x00000010; 
00048     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_5           = 0x00000020; 
00049     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_6           = 0x00000040; 
00050     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_7           = 0x00000080; 
00051     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_8           = 0x00000100; 
00052     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_9           = 0x00000200; 
00053     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_10          = 0x00000400; 
00054     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_11          = 0x00000800; 
00055     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_12          = 0x00001000; 
00056     static const int32_t WEF_RESERVED_13              = 0x00002000;

00060     static const int32_t WEF_RESERVED_17              = 0x00020000; 
00061     static const int32_t WEF_RESERVED_18              = 0x00040000; 
00062     static const int32_t REGIONAL_INTERFERENCE        = 0x00080000; 
00063     static const int32_t CO_SITE_INTERFERENCE         = 0x00100000; 
00064     static const int32_t OUT_OF_BAND_POWER_COMPLIANCE = 0x00200000; 
00065     static const int32_t IN_BAND_POWER_COMPLIANCE     = 0x00400000; 
00066     static const int32_t DISTORTION                   = 0x00800000; 
00067     static const int32_t HAZARDOUS_POWER_LEVELS       = 0x01000000; 
00068     static const int32_t TIMESTAMP_PROBLEM            = 0x02000000; 
00069     static const int32_t FIELD_VALUE_INVALID          = 0x04000000; 
00070     static const int32_t PARAM_UNSUPPORTED_PRECISION  = 0x08000000;

00073     static const int32_t DEVICE_FAILURE               = 0x40000000; 
00074     static const int32_t FIELD_NOT_EXECUTED           = 0x80000000;

00086   // Constant to use in place of CIF# for getting offset to Free-form Warning/Error message
00087   static const int8_t FREE_FORM_MESSAGE = (int8_t) 0xFF; // (int8_t) 0xFF == -1
00088 
00090   typedef struct FreeFormMessage {
00092     FreeFormMessage () : bbuf(0) {
00093     }
00100     FreeFormMessage (const std::string msg) : 
00101           bbuf(msg.size()+1) { // one extra for null terminator
00102       if (msg.size()==0) {
00103         bbuf.resize(0);
00104       } else {
00105         memcpy(&bbuf[0], &msg[0], msg.size());
00106         bbuf[msg.size()] = '\0';
00107       }
00108     }
00117     FreeFormMessage (const char* msg, const size_t len) : bbuf(len) {
00118       memcpy(&bbuf[0], msg, len);
00119     }
00126     void setMessage (const std::string msg) {
00127       if (msg.size()==0) {
00128         bbuf.resize(0);
00129       } else {
00130         bbuf.resize(msg.size()+1); // one extra for null terminator
00131         memcpy(&bbuf[0], &msg[0], msg.size());
00132         bbuf[msg.size()] = '\0';
00133       }
00134     }
00142     void setMessage (const char* msg, const size_t len) {
00143       bbuf.resize(len);
00144       memcpy(&bbuf[0], msg, len);
00145     }
00154     std::string text () const {
00155       if (bbuf.size() == 0) { // no/empty message
00156         return "";
00157       } else if (bbuf[bbuf.size()-1] == '\0') { // null terminated c-string
00158         return std::string((char*) &bbuf[0]);
00159       } else { // non null terminated char array
00160         return std::string((char*) &bbuf[0], bbuf.size());
00161       }
00162     }
00172     const char* buffer () const {
00173       return &bbuf[0];
00174     }
00178     size_t size () const {
00179       return bbuf.size();
00180     }
00184     bool empty () const {
00185       return bbuf.size()==0;
00186     }
00187     std::vector<char> bbuf; 
00188   } FreeFormMessage_t;

00376       UNUSED_VARIABLE(cifNum); UNUSED_VARIABLE(bit); UNUSED_VARIABLE(xoff); UNUSED_VARIABLE(cif7bit);
00377       throw VRTException("All Warn/Error fields are 32 bits; BasicAcknowledgePacket only supports getL.");
00378     }

00382     }

00488     protected: inline bool isCIFEnable (int8_t cifNum) const {
00489       bool occurrence = cifNum&0x08; // false for warn / true for error
00490       switch(cifNum&0xF7) { // Ignore bit 3 (occurrence)
00491         case 0:
00492           if ((!occurrence && getWarningsGenerated()) || (occurrence && getErrorsGenerated()))
00493             return true;
00494           else
00495             return false;
00496         case 1: return isCIF1Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00497         case 2: return isCIF2Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00498         case 3: return isCIF3Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00499         case 7: return isCIF7Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00500         default:
00501           throw VRTException("Invalid Context Indicator Field number.");
00502       }
00503     }

00541     // Error Indicator Fields
00542     protected: int32_t getErrorIndicatorField (int8_t eifNum) const {
00543       return getContextIndicatorField(eifNum | 0x8);
00544     }
00545     protected: int32_t getErrorIndicatorField (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field) const {
00546       return getContextIndicatorField(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8);
00547     }
00548     protected: boolNull getErrorIndicatorFieldBit (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field) const {
00549       return getContextIndicatorFieldBit(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field));
00550     }

00560     public: int32_t getWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) const {
00561       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00562       return getL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00563     }
00564 
00571     public: void setWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00572       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00573       setL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), val, cif7bit);
00574     }
00575     
00582     public: void addWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00583       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00584       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00585       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00586       setL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), val | bits, cif7bit);
00587     }
00588 
00596     public: void removeWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00597       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00598       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00599       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00600       setL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), ~val & bits, cif7bit);
00601     }
00602

00608     // Error Fields

00617     public: int32_t getError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) const {
00618       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00619       return getL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00620     }
00621 
00628     public: void setError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL){
00629       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00630       setL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), val, cif7bit);
00631     }
00632     
00639     public: void addError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00640       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00641       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00642       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00643       setL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), val | bits, cif7bit);
00644     }
00645 
00653     public: void removeError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00654       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00655       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00656       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00657       setL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), ~val & bits, cif7bit);
00658     }
00659 
00663     public: std::vector<WarningErrorField_t> getErrors () const;
00664 
00668     public: bool hasFreeFormMessage () const;
00669 
00673     public: FreeFormMessage_t getFreeFormMessage () const;
00674 
00678     public: void setFreeFormMessage (const FreeFormMessage_t msg);
00679

00687     public: virtual Value*    getField      (int32_t id) const __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00688     public: virtual void      setField      (int32_t id, const Value* val);
00689     */
00690 
00691   }; /*  BasicAcknowledgePacket */
